title: The Ultimate AI Assistant Playbook
subtitle: A strategic framework for designing and building effective AI assistants, from simple FAQ bots to proactive, enterprise-grade co-pilots.

overview.techStack: Copilot Studio, Generative AI, Power Platform

content.value: In today's business landscape, AI assistants are becoming essential tools for enhancing customer service and internal productivity. However, many organizations stop at simple, reactive FAQ bots. This playbook provides a strategic framework to help you think bigger, outlining a maturity model for evolving your AI assistants from basic information providers into proactive, value-driving co-pilots that can perform complex actions and anticipate user needs.

content.text: The Three Tiers of AI Assistants

content.value: To build a successful AI strategy, it's crucial to understand the different levels of capability. I've broken this down into a simple 'Three Tiers' model. Each tier builds upon the last, adding new layers of intelligence, integration, and business value.

content.alt: Diagram showing the three tiers of AI assistants.

cards.title: Informational Assistant
cards.description: Answers questions by connecting to a trusted knowledge base (SharePoint, websites) using Generative AI to find and summarize information in natural language.

cards.title: Action-Oriented Assistant
cards.description: Performs tasks for the user by triggering Power Automate flows (plugins) to interact with other systems via APIs, such as looking up an order or creating a ticket.

cards.title: Proactive Co-Pilot
cards.description: Anticipates user needs by monitoring business events. Uses scheduled flows and Generative AI to decide on the best action and notify users proactively.

content.value: By understanding these three tiers, you can create a strategic roadmap for your AI assistant program. Start with a high-value Tier 1 use case to build momentum, then progressively add Tier 2 and Tier 3 capabilities to create a truly transformative co-pilot that delivers significant and measurable business value.
